commit_message:
docs(agents): update input contracts for worktree integration

Update all 7 implementation agents with:
- worktree_path field in input contracts
- Path prefixing requirements ({worktree_path}/{relative_path})
- No-persistent-cd rule for all agents
- implementer-setup-agent: worktree creation, beads sync, bead commit
- committer-agent: dual-mode operation (commit/publish) per Spec S04
- needs_reconcile semantics per D10
warnings: Manual policy: staged files only, awaiting user commit
